headline: AvalonBay (AVB) Q2 Earnings: Taking a Look at Key Metrics Versus Estimates
summary: The headline numbers for AvalonBay (AVB) give insight into how the company performed in the quarter ended June 2025, but it may be worthwhile to compare some of its key metrics to Wall Street estimates and the year-ago actuals.

headline: AvalonBay Communities (AVB) Surpasses Q2 FFO Estimates
summary: AvalonBay (AVB) delivered FFO and revenue surprises of +0.71% and -0.20%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: AvalonBay Communities (AVB) Surpasses Q2 FFO Estimates
raw.summary: AvalonBay (AVB) delivered FFO and revenue surprises of +0.71% and -0.20%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: AvalonBay: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The results surpassed Wall Street expectations. The Arlington, Virginia-based real estate investment trust said it had funds from operations of $404 million, or $2.82 per share, in the period. The average estimate of nine analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for funds from operations of $2.80 per share.

headline: AvalonBay Communities, Inc. Provides Q2 2025 Results and Updates Full Year 2025 Outlook
summary: ARLINGTON, Va., July 30, 2025--AvalonBay Communities, Inc. (NYSE: AVB) (the "Company") reported Earnings per Share – diluted ("EPS"), Funds from Operations attributable to common stockholders - diluted ("FFO") per share and Core FFO per share (as defined in this release) for the three and six months ended June 30, 2025 and 2024 as detailed below.
